messages.message:
@dlluncor I made a ticket for the OCR Config thing and outlined 3 possible options: https://instabase.atlassian.net/browse/UX-57
Would love to get your opinion on which one of these seems best / if there's another better path we could take. Also @Eric Han and cc @Matt

3 is the ultimate goal it seems like but for now I think an immediate win would be 1/2. I’m mulling over what makes most sense. The most common use cases I see are:
1. Need extra settings for refactor/visual refiner to run 
2. Need extra settings for provenance tracking
3. Tweaking random OCR settings for better results 
4. Language support 

Is there a middle ground where you can have a check box that has enable:
-Provenance Tracking 
-Visual Refiner 
-Language Code

Then maybe some extended settings for OCR tweaks.

This is just initial thoughts
Provided my thoughts there in the bug — happy to have a quick meeting about it as well with other relevant folks
What if we started option 3 and just extract out the modal for now to make it a react component?

that’d be pretty awesome! if we could reactify the modal sounds like we’d be able to turn around the feature at an earlier date. I’m generally a fan of the iterative approach, but understand that building from the ground up can help in certain cases. Will let you all make the call, since that specific OCR options is an existing pain point, it would be pretty awesome to have in a more scoped timeframe if possible!

I need to IBApp-ify Flow to some extent next week anyways it turns out, for some other stuff PLEX is doing (https://instabase.atlassian.net/browse/UX-58). When I do that I will see what we can do about the modal too!
